title: Roman Coin Earrings
description: Elegant earrings inspired by ancient Roman coins. Crafted with antique detailing and a timeless aesthetic.

title: Eye Pendant Necklace
description: A delicate necklace featuring a mystical eye pendant, symbolizing protection and insight.

title: Neutral Parfum
description: A genderless fragrance with earthy undertones and subtle floral highlights. Made for everyday elegance.

title: All Seeing Eye Ring
description: Bold ring with an engraved all-seeing eye motif. A statement piece with esoteric flair.

title: Double Snake Ring
description: Two intertwined snakes form the band of this detailed silver ring — a symbol of transformation and duality.

title: Skull & Palm Ring
description: An edgy ring combining palmistry symbolism and skull detail — perfect for the bold and curious.

title: NYC Caps
description: Classic baseball-style caps with NYC embroidery. Designed for urban explorers and city dwellers.

title: Poison Cigarette Case
description: Vintage-inspired cigarette case featuring a 'Poison' label. A tongue-in-cheek twist on classic accessories.

title: Kerosene Lighter
description: Retro-style kerosene lighter with industrial vibes. Functional, collectible, and undeniably cool.
